examples.translation: 一年后能对再度感染产生强大免疫力.
examples.last: to reinfection develops after one year.

examples.translation: 新来的人对这一疾病在当地的几种类型缺乏免疫力.
examples.last: against local strains of the disease.

examples.translation: 他们不会因这次违法行为而受到检控 - 他们享有外交豁免权。
examples.first: They can't be prosecuted for this offence - they have diplomatic

n: the state of not being susceptible
(medicine) the condition in which an organism can resist disease
the quality of being unaffected by something
免疫, 免疫性, 免除
